class.source: def test_terminal_output_request_content_type_charset(charset, text): r = http( '--offline', DUMMY_URL, f'Content-Type: text/plain; charset={charset.upper()}', env=MockEnvironment( stdin=text.encode(charset), stdin_isatty=False, ), ) assert text in r

def test_terminal_output_request_charset_detection(charset, text): r = http( '--offline', DUMMY_URL, 'Content-Type: text/plain', env=MockEnvironment( stdin=text.encode(charset), stdin_isatty=False, ), ) assert text in r
